invalid_plugins_dir.description: The enabled plugins directory cannot be opened

cannot_load.description: Kuzzle is unable to load a plugin
cannot_load.message: Unable to load plugin from path "%s"; %s.

invalid_hook.description: A hook must point to either a function named directly exposed by the plugin, or a function. This error is thrown when a hook property is configured with neither of these values
invalid_hook.message: Unable to configure a hook for the event "%s": "%s" should be a function. %s

invalid_pipe.description: A pipe must point to either a function named directly exposed by the plugin, or a function. This error is thrown when a hook property is configured with neither of these values
invalid_pipe.message: Unable to configure a pipe for the event "%s": "%s" should be a function. %s

init_not_found.description: The plugin does not have an 'init' function

privileged_not_supported.description: The 'privileged' flag has been set in Kuzzle's configuration for that plugin, but not in the plugin's manifest
privileged_not_supported.message: The plugin "%s" is configured to run in privileged mode, but it does not seem to support it.

privileged_not_set.description: The 'privileged' flag has been set in the plugin's manifest file, but it needs also to be added in Kuzzle's configuration
privileged_not_set.message: The plugin "%s" needs to run in privileged mode to work, you have to explicitly set "privileged: true" in its configuration.

not_a_constructor.description: The exposed plugin is not a constructor

name_already_exists.description: Another plugin with the same name has already been loaded

invalid_plugin_name.description: The plugin name is invalid. Plugin names can only contain lowercase letters and dashes.
invalid_plugin_name.message: Plugin name "%s" is invalid. Plugin names must be in kebab-case.

no_name_provided.description: The plugin does not have a constructor method and no name has been provided.
no_name_provided.message: Cannot infer plugin name. No constructor method and no name provided

invalid_application_name.description: The application name is invalid. Application names can only contain lowercase letters and dashes.
invalid_application_name.message: Application name "%s" is invalid. Application names must be in kebab-case.

duplicated_api_definition.description: You cannot use the "api" and the "controllers" objects at the same time. Use the "api" object to define controllers.
duplicated_api_definition.message: Cannot define new controllers in the "api" and the "controllers" objects at the same time

plugin_not_found.description: The request plugin does not exists or have not been loaded yet.

failed_init.description: An exception was thrown by a plugin's init function
failed_init.message: Something went wrong during initialization of "%s" plugin.

unexpected_error.description: Embeds an unexpected plugin error into a standardized KuzzleError object

pipe_timeout.description: A pipe function execution took more than the configured server limit
pipe_timeout.message: Plugin "%s": timeout error. A pipe on the event "%s" exceeded the timeout delay (%sms). Aborting.

too_many_pipes.description: The number of running pipes exceeds the configured capacity (see configuration files). This may be caused by pipes being too slow, or by an insufficient number of Kuzzle nodes.
too_many_pipes.message: Request discarded: maximum number of executing pipe functions reached.

already_started.description: Features definition cannot be changed after startup.
already_started.message: Cannot use property "%s" when application is already running

unavailable_before_start.description: The property is only accessible after application startup.
unavailable_before_start.message: Cannot use property "%s" before application startup

unknown_pipe.description: The provided pipe identifier is unknown.

unexpected_installation_error.description: Embeds an unexpected installation error into a standardized KuzzleError object.
unexpected_installation_error.message: Caught an unexpected error while executing installation "%s": %s

invalid_description.description: The strategy.description field must be an object
invalid_description.message: %s expected the strategy description to be an object, got: %s.

invalid_methods.description: The strategy.methods field must be an object
invalid_methods.message: %s expected a "methods" property of type "object", got: %s.

invalid_method_type.description: Method definitions in the strategy.methods configuration must be of type string
invalid_method_type.message: %s expected a "%s" property of type "string", got: %s.

missing_method_function.description: A required strategy method is missing
missing_method_function.message: %s the strategy method "%s" must point to an exposed function.

invalid_config.description: The strategy.config field must be an object
invalid_config.message: %s expected a "config" property of type "object", got: %s.

unexpected_constructor.description: The (deprecated) constructor property can only be set if there is no authenticator defined
unexpected_constructor.message: %s the "authenticator" and "constructor" parameters cannot both be set.

invalid_constructor.description: The strategy.constructor field must be a constructor

invalid_authenticator.description: The strategy.authenticator field must be a string
invalid_authenticator.message: %s expected an "authenticator" property of type "string", got: %s.

unknown_authenticator.description: This strategy uses an authenticator that hasn't been declared in this.authenticators

invalid_option.description: If defined, the "strategy.config.strategyOptions" and "strategy.config.authenticateOptions" properties must be objects
invalid_option.message: %s expected the "%s" property to be of type "object", got: %s.

invalid_fields.description: The field strategy.config.fields must be an array or null
invalid_fields.message: %s expected the "fields" property to be of type "array", got: %s.

invalid_definition.description: The strategies property must be a non-empty object
invalid_definition.message: %s the exposed "strategies" plugin property must be a non-empty object.

failed_registration.description: Passportjs rejected this strategy (see the message for more information)

invalid_verify_return.description: The "verify" method must return a promise
invalid_verify_return.message: %s The "verify" method is expected to return a Promise, got: %s.

invalid_verify_resolve.description: The "verify" strategy method resolved to a non-object return value
invalid_verify_resolve.message: %s invalid authentication strategy result (expected an object).

invalid_kuid.description: The "verify" method returned an invalid kuid
invalid_kuid.message: %s invalid authentication kuid returned: expected a string, got a %s.

unknown_kuid.description: The "verify" method returned an unknown kuid
unknown_kuid.message: %s returned an unknown Kuzzle user identifier.

unauthorized_removal.description: Tried to remove a strategy owned by another plugin
unauthorized_removal.message: Cannot remove strategy %s: owned by another plugin.

strategy_not_found.description: Attempted to remove a non-existent authentication strategy
strategy_not_found.message: Cannot remove strategy %s: strategy does not exist.

missing_user.description: A strategy plugin approved credentials without providing a user object to Kuzzle

missing_optional_method.description: An optional method has not been implemented for this strategy
missing_optional_method.message: "%s" method is optional. The %s strategy plugin has not yet implemented it.

invalid_description.description: The controller description must be an object
invalid_description.message: %s Invalid controller description type (expected object, got: "%s").

invalid_action.description: A controller action must be a function name, or a function
invalid_action.message: %s Action for "%s" is neither a function nor a function name. %s

unexpected_route_property.description: An unexpected property has been found in a controller route definition

invalid_route_property.description: Invalid route property format (must be a non-empty string)

undefined_controller.description: A HTTP route points to an non-existent controller

undefined_action.description: A HTTP route points to an non-existent controller action

unsupported_verb.description: A HTTP route is using an unsupported HTTP verb
unsupported_verb.message: %s Only the following http verbs are allowed: "%s". %s

unserializable_response.description: A plugin controller action returned a non-serializable response
unserializable_response.message: Unable to serialize response. Are you trying to return the request?

invalid_action_response.description: API actions added by plugins must return a promise
invalid_action_response.message: Unexpected return value from action "%s:%s": expected a Promise

cannot_load.description: Unable to load the plugin's manifest file

version_mismatch.description: Current Kuzzle's version does not match the plugin's requirements
version_mismatch.message: [%s/manifest.json] Version mismatch: current Kuzzle version %s does not match the manifest requirements (%s).

invalid_name_type.message: [%s] Invalid "name" property: expected a non-empty string.

invalid_name.description: Invalid characters in a plugin's name
invalid_name.message: [%s] Invalid plugin name. The name must be comprised only of letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores.

invalid_errors.message: [%s] errors field in manifest.json badly formatted: %s

invalid_privileged.message: [%s] Invalid "privileged" property: expected a boolean, got a %s.

missing_package.description: The plugin is missing a 'package.json' file (run 'npm init' to create one)

missing_package_name.description: A 'name' property in the 'package.json' file is required by Kuzzle, as it is used as the plugin's unique name

missing_version.description: Plugin manifest must provide a kuzzleVersion parameter, with the range of compatible Kuzzle versions

missing_collection.description: The 'collection' argument is required, but none was provided

unavailable_realtime.description: Due to technical limitations, subscribe and unsubscribe methods are only available through the embedded SDK.
unavailable_realtime.message: The method "realtime:%s" is unavailable with execute(). Use the embedded SDK instead.

invalid_user.description: The user object provided to the sdk.as() method is not a valid user with a least an '_id' property
invalid_user.message: You must provide a valid User object when adding context with as().

invalid_callback.description: A non-function callback has been provided
invalid_callback.message: Invalid argument: Expected callback to be a function, received "%s".

missing_request.description: A Request object is required, but none was supplied
missing_request.message: Invalid argument: a Request object must be supplied.

missing_request_data.description: A Request object and/or request data must be provided
missing_request_data.message: A Request object and/or request data must be provided.

invalid_event.description: Invalid event name (colons are not allowed in event names)
invalid_event.message: Custom event invalid name (%s). Colons are not allowed in custom events.

missing_authenticator.message: [%s] Strategy %s: dynamic strategy registration can only be done using an "authenticator" option (see https://tinyurl.com/y7boozbk).

not_an_object.description: The "authenticators" property must be an object
not_an_object.message: %s the exposed "authenticators" plugin property must be of type "object".

invalid_authenticator.description: Authenticators exposed in the "authenticators" object must be constructors
invalid_authenticator.message: %s invalid authenticator.%s property: expected a constructor.
